welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sevilla, a city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant culture. Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Riverwatch Floating Resto

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Pablo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
